metadata.name: Mark Moore

persona.name: Marcus Green
persona.goal: Bundle business internet + TV for guest rooms; understand options and schedule a callback
persona.context: Renovation complete; upgrading guest experience; needs coordinated install and minimal downtime
persona.tone: Collaborative, asks about timeline and setup

intent.name: Vague Request About Internet Without Business Context
intent.description: The customer asks about internet but doesn’t specify business vs residential or whether they’re an existing customer.
intent.goal: Clarify customer type and route to sales appointment or appropriate support/portal.
intent.initialMessage: How much is internet and what do I need to sign up?

emotion.name: Excited
emotion.description: Upbeat language, quick replies, eager to schedule; uses positive framing like “ready to get this set up” or “can’t wait to switch.”

metadata.outcome: Phone appointment set for Monday at 10 AM ET with notes about internet + TV needs.

turns.content: How much is internet and what do I need to sign up?
Our Business Class agent can help with pricing and sign‑up details. Can I schedule a call? May I have your name to set it up?

messages: Our Business Class agent can help with pricing and sign‑up details. Can I schedule a call? May I have your name to set it up?

turns.content:
Yeah, that’d be great—I’m ready to get this set up.  
My name’s Marcus Green. What do you need next to schedule the call—phone, email, and a good time?
Thanks, Marcus. Just to confirm, this is for a business line, right? What date, time and time zone work best for a quick call?

messages: Thanks, Marcus. Just to confirm, this is for a business line, right? What date, time and time zone work best for a quick call?

turns.content:
Yes, this is for a business line—I’m the general manager of a mid‑size hotel.  

Let’s do a call **next Monday at 10:00 AM Eastern**. If that’s not available, 11:00 AM Eastern the same day works too.
Got it, Marcus. Please share the best phone number we can reach you at for the call. Once I have that, I’ll lock in Monday at 10 AM ET.

messages: Got it, Marcus. Please share the best phone number we can reach you at for the call. Once I have that, I’ll lock in Monday at 10 AM ET.

turns.content:
Perfect, let’s lock it in. You can reach me at **817-323-8608**.  

Once it’s scheduled, can you also note that I’m interested in **business internet bundled with TV for about 80 guest rooms** so we can dive right into options on the call?
